availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Cohorn (18th KY Inf. Deserter/Franklin Farm Hand)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Kentucky native. Farm laborer in Franklin County in 1860. Enrolled as a private in the 18th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) on July 7, 1862. Deserted on November 12, 1862. Returned in March 1864. Deserted in May 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 19.
